sentence.Network_en: Unhappily the facts do not wholly bear out the theory.
sentence.Network_cn: 令人遗憾的是，这些事实并不能完全证明该理论。

sentence.Network_en: Unhappily for Berkowitz, he never got a penny.
sentence.Network_cn: 可惜伯科威茨从来没得到过一分钱。

sentence.Network_en: On May 23rd, unhappily, the little boy died.
sentence.Network_cn: 令人伤心的是，5月23号，那个小男孩死了。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 有道学堂 | 微英语 ... A. unexpectedly 出乎意料地； B. unhappily 不幸地； C. untidily 凌乱地；.
冀教版小学英语单词归类 - 豆丁网 ... happily 高兴地 unhappily 不高兴地 loudly 吵闹地响亮.
残念翻译成英文叫什么。_百度知道 ... 不幸地;遗憾地 unhappily 懊悔,悔恨;抱歉,遗憾 regret.
英语构词法_百度百科 ... unsuccessfully（ 不成功的）， unhappily（ 不开心的）， undo（ 复原），.

list.abs: most unhappily , I am . ', 很不幸 , 是的 '
says Danny , a little unhappily ., 丹尼说道 , 有一点不开心.
unhappily married women still make pilgrimages to Santa Rita of Cascia in Umbria .婚姻不幸的妇女仍旧到翁布里亚向加西亚的圣里达朝拜。
Jim is also unhappily married and you begin to commiserate .吉米也对婚姻不满意，而你开始同情他了。
They lived unhappily together ., 他们不快乐地生活在一起.

entry.tran: 令人伤心地；令人遗憾地
entry.def: You use unhappily to introduce or refer to a statement when you consider it is sad and wish that it was different.

example.ex: On May 23rd, unhappily, the little boy died...
example.tran: 令人伤心的是，5月23号，那个小男孩死了。

example.ex: Unhappily the facts do not wholly bear out the theory...
example.tran: 令人遗憾的是，这些事实并不能完全证明该理论。

sentences.sentence: "sadly he died before he could see his grandchild"

auth_sentence.content: Unhappily, Professor Lindenmayer died before the book was completed.
auth_sentence.res_content: Unhappily, Professor Lindenmayer died before the book was completed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Unhappily, Professor Lindenmayer died before the book was completed.

auth_sentence.content: Unhappily, perhaps; not riotously, as they do here.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Unhappily, perhaps; not riotously, as they do here.

auth_sentence.content: But by the anniversary of Obama's Inauguration Krugman felt unhappily vindicated.

means.word_mean: 不快乐地;悲惨地;痛苦地

sentences.en: After all that excitement the day was bound to end unhappily.
sentences.cn: 在所有的兴奋过后，这一天注定要以不快而结束。

sentences.en: He walked unhappily towards the house.
sentences.cn: 他怏怏不乐地向那屋子走去。

sentences.en: Unhappily, he never saw that girl again.
sentences.cn: 遗憾的是他再也没有见到过那女孩。
